t: Amazon
s: Wow. I'm stumped for words... I like Doug Stone songs, as a rule. "In a Different Light"? Who couldn't like that? "I Thought It Was You"? Guy-can't-get-over-girl music, always a favorite. So what's wrong with this CD? Let me count the ways: acoustics, the vocals, the selections, the vocals...

t: I Thought It Was You by Stone, Doug (1991) Audio CD - Amazon.com Music
s: Come in out of the Pain is my favorite Doug Stone song and he's my favorite so that says a lot. Buy this album, and his first one, and get his Christmas album it is really another Masterpiece studio album of all new songs not traditional xmas songs. From the Heart is great. Then the stuff after is really good ( A to A-) but the first four albums are epic A+++! ... I bought this CD ...

s: A straight-ahead set of tunes featuring gems from Jimmy Raney, Duke Pearson, Grant Green and others.
